original: @143a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @143a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: a'ar+ya manydzu shr'i n'a ma sangg'i ti s'a dha na n'a ma /
analyzed: a'ar+ya manydzu shr'i n'a ma sangg'i ti s'a dha na n'a ma /
translated: Ārya-mañjuśrī-nāma-saṃgīti-sādhana-nāma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs /
translated: The Means of Accomplishment of the Noble Mañjuśrī's Name-in-Full

original: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to Mañjuśrī, the wisdom being.

original: yon tan ye shes mchog gi mchog gyur pa'i //
analyzed: yon tan ye shes mchog gi mchog gyur pa'i //
translated: The supreme of all supreme qualities and wisdom,

original: bde ba'i stobs kyis bde ba'i ro myang ba'i //
analyzed: bde ba'i stobs kyis bde ba'i ro myang ba'i //
translated: The one who tastes the bliss of bliss by the power of bliss,

original: rang gi rgyud gsum dag pa'i 'jam dpal de la 'dud //🔽'jam dpal mtshan ni brjod pa yi //
analyzed: rang gi rgyud gsum dag pa'i 'jam dpal de la 'dud // 'jam dpal mtshan ni brjod pa yi //
translated: I bow to that Mañjuśrī, whose continuum is threefold pure.

original: gzhung lugs thob par gyur pa yi //🔽yongs bsdus sgrub thabs gsal bar bsde ba //
analyzed: gzhung lugs thob par gyur pa yi // yongs bsdus sgrub thabs gsal bar bsde ba //
translated: Having attained the scriptural tradition🔽Of the recitation of Mañjuśrī's name,🔽I will clearly compile the means of accomplishment

original: de'i gzhung bdag gis bshad par bya ;
analyzed: de'i gzhung bdag gis bshad par bya ;
translated: And explain its text.🔽The yogin of the Mahāyāna mantra,

original: / shes rab snying rjer ldan pa yi //
analyzed: / shes rab snying rjer ldan pa yi //
translated: Endowed with wisdom and compassion,

original: zab mo'i don la dgongs pa yis //🔽theg chen sngags pa'i rnal 'byor pas //🔽yid dga' ba yi gnas nyid du //
analyzed: zab mo'i don la dgongs pa yis // theg chen sngags pa'i rnal 'byor pas // yid dga' ba yi gnas nyid du //
translated: With the intention of the profound meaning,🔽In a place that delights the mind,

original: bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug ste /
analyzed: bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug ste /
translated: Seated on a comfortable seat,

original: snying gar nyi dkyil aa bsams la //
analyzed: snying gar nyi dkyil aa bsams la //
translated: Visualize the syllable A on a sun disk in the heart.

original: 'od phyung 'phags pa bla mar bcas //
analyzed: 'od phyung 'phags pa bla mar bcas //
translated: Light radiates out and invites the noble ones together with the gurus.

original: yid kyis mdun du sbyan drangs la //
analyzed: yid kyis mdun du sbyan drangs la //
translated: Invite them in front with the mind.

original: mandal mchod pa phul byas la //
analyzed: mandal mchod pa phul byas la //
translated: Make a mandala offering.🔽Take refuge in the Three Jewels,🔽confess all misdeeds without exception,

original: gsum la skyabs su gsol ba dang // sdig pa ma lus bshags pa dang // byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do //
analyzed: gsum la skyabs su gsol ba dang // sdig pa ma lus bshags pa dang // byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do //
translated: and generate the mind of supreme awakening.

original: de yang rgyud las /
analyzed: de yang rgyud las /
translated: Moreover, the tantra states:

original: dpal ldan padma sangs rgyas skyes //
analyzed: dpal ldan padma sangs rgyas skyes //
translated: The glorious Buddha born from the lotus,

original: tshogs gnyis tshogs ni bsags pa po //
analyzed: tshogs gnyis tshogs ni bsags pa po //
translated: the one who accumulates the accumulations of the two accumulations,

original: rtag pa kun rgyal rnal 'byor can //
analyzed: rtag pa kun rgyal rnal 'byor can //
translated: the eternal one, the universal monarch, the yogi,

original: bsam gtan bsam bya blo ldan mchog / rdo rje dregs pa rdo rje'i snying //
analyzed: bsam gtan bsam bya blo ldan mchog / rdo rje dregs pa rdo rje'i snying //
translated: the supreme one with the mind of meditation and the object of meditation, the vajra, the arrogant one, the vajra heart,

original: rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che //
analyzed: rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che //
translated: the vajra sun, the great light,

original: rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od //
analyzed: rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od //
translated: the vajra moon, the stainless light,

original: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas aa las byung //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas aa las byung //
translated: the perfect Buddha arisen from A,

original: kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od //
analyzed: kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od //
translated: the light of the blazing multicolored light,

original: 'phags lam shin tu mtho la gnas //
analyzed: 'phags lam shin tu mtho la gnas //
translated: abiding on the exalted path that is very high,

original: bla ma gsang sngags che ba'i mchog / sems can kun gyi yid ltar mgyogs //
analyzed: bla ma gsang sngags che ba'i mchog / sems can kun gyi yid ltar mgyogs //
translated: the guru, the supreme one of great mantra, faster than the mind of all sentient beings,

original: dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa yin //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa yin //
translated: It is the great, vast mandala.

original: mchod cing brjod pa drang srong che //
analyzed: mchod cing brjod pa drang srong che //
translated: It is the praise and recitation of the great sage.

original: gtso bo dkon mchog gsum 'dzin pa //
analyzed: gtso bo dkon mchog gsum 'dzin pa //
translated: It is the chief holder of the Three Jewels.

original: dag par byed pa sdig sel ba //
analyzed: dag par byed pa sdig sel ba //
translated: It is the purifier, the dispeller of evil.

original: sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med //
analyzed: sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med //
translated: It is the unsurpassed enlightenment of the Buddha.

original: ces gsungs so //
analyzed: ces gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de nas @143b skad cig ma la bdag nyid 'jam dpal du bsgoms la /
analyzed: de nas @143b skad cig ma la bdag nyid 'jam dpal du bsgoms la /
translated: Then, in an instant, meditate on yourself as Manjushri.

original: de'i thugs ka nas aa las /
analyzed: de'i thugs ka nas aa las /
translated: From his heart, an A becomes

original: rdo rje shugs can 'jigs par byed //
analyzed: rdo rje shugs can 'jigs par byed //
translated: a vajra-powered, terrifying

original: ha la ha la gdong brgya ba //
analyzed: ha la ha la gdong brgya ba //
translated: Halahala with a hundred faces,

original: dpal ldan lag brgyas gang la //
analyzed: dpal ldan lag brgyas gang la //
translated: glorious with a hundred hands,

original: brdung ba'i mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin //
analyzed: brdung ba'i mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin //
translated: holding various weapons to beat

original: phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed pa'o//
analyzed: phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed pa'o//
translated: and sending out various emanations in the ten directions.

original: aom manydzu shr'i kro dha ya m'anata ka h'um phat /
analyzed: aom manydzu shr'i kro dha ya m'anata ka h'um phat /
translated: Om, to the wrathful Yamantaka of Manjushri, hum phat!

original: bhe ro ha na ra da ha ra /
analyzed: bhe ro ha na ra da ha ra /
translated: Bherohana radhara!

original: pa tsa ra sarba aa mu ka badzra khadga tstshe da raksha raksha h'um h'um phat phat /
analyzed: pa tsa ra sarba aa mu ka badzra khadga tstshe da raksha raksha h'um h'um phat phat /
translated: Pacify all enemies, vajra-killers, protect, protect, hum hum phat phat!

original: ces brjod pas mtshon cha dpag tu med pas mtshams bcad do //
analyzed: ces brjod pas mtshon cha dpag tu med pas mtshams bcad do //
translated: By reciting this, the boundaries are sealed with immeasurable weapons.

original: de nas aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konyham zhes brjod pas na stong par bsam /
analyzed: de nas aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konyham zhes brjod pas na stong par bsam /
translated: Then, by reciting Oṃ śūnyatā jñāna vajra svabhāva ātmako ’haṃ, imagine that [the world] becomes empty.

original: snying ga'i sa bon las byung ba'o //
analyzed: snying ga'i sa bon las byung ba'o //
translated: It arises from the seed syllable in the heart.

original: 'byung lnga'i yi ge rang bzhin chad //🔽ae // yam /
analyzed: 'byung lnga'i yi ge rang bzhin chad // ae // yam /
translated: The nature of the five elements is destroyed.

original: bam / ram lam /
analyzed: bam / ram lam /
translated: E yaṃ vaṃ raṃ laṃ.

original: nam mkha' rlung chu ri rab me dang bcas //
analyzed: nam mkha' rlung chu ri rab me dang bcas //
translated: Space, wind, water, earth, and fire.

original: de steng padma'i lte ba la //
analyzed: de steng padma'i lte ba la //
translated: Upon that, in the center of a lotus,

original: bhr'um las ye shes gzhal yas khang //
analyzed: bhr'um las ye shes gzhal yas khang //
translated: From bhrūṃ arises the immeasurable palace of wisdom,

original: pho brang padma 'khor lor bcas //
analyzed: pho brang padma 'khor lor bcas //
translated: With a palace, a lotus, and a wheel,

original: gru chad sgo bzhi mu khyud ldan //
analyzed: gru chad sgo bzhi mu khyud ldan //
translated: With four corners, four gates, and a periphery.🔽The tantra states:

original: rgyud las / stong pa nyid dga' 'dod chags blo //
analyzed: rgyud las / stong pa nyid dga' 'dod chags blo //
translated: The mind of desire and passion for emptiness,

original: rdo rje snying po mkha' 'dra ba //
analyzed: rdo rje snying po mkha' 'dra ba //
translated: The vajra essence is like space,

original: phra zhing zag med sa bon bral //
analyzed: phra zhing zag med sa bon bral //
translated: Subtle, uncontaminated, and free from seeds.

original: 'byung ba chen po rgyu gcig po //
analyzed: 'byung ba chen po rgyu gcig po //
translated: The single cause of the great elements,

original: dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa yin //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa yin //
translated: The vast great maṇḍala.

original: zhes gsungs // de nas gdan sgom ste /🔽pam las padma zla ba'i gdan //
analyzed: zhes gsungs // de nas gdan sgom ste / pam las padma zla ba'i gdan //
translated: Then, meditate on the seats:🔽From paṃ arises a lotus and moon seat,

original: aa dang ma las nyi ma'i gdan //
analyzed: aa dang ma las nyi ma'i gdan //
translated: From a and ma arises a sun seat,

original: de steng aa yi 'phro 'du las ;
analyzed: de steng aa yi 'phro 'du las ;
translated: And upon that, from the emanation and re-absorption of a,

original: / aa las 'jam dbyangs rdo rjer gyur //
analyzed: / aa las 'jam dbyangs rdo rjer gyur //
translated: From A, he becomes Mañjughoṣa-vajra.

original: sku mdog dmar ser gdong lnga pa //
analyzed: sku mdog dmar ser gdong lnga pa //
translated: His color is orange, and he has five faces.

original: dkar sngo dmar ljang dmar ser ro //
analyzed: dkar sngo dmar ljang dmar ser ro //
translated: They are white, blue, red, green, and orange.

original: zur phud lnga ldan cod pan can //
analyzed: zur phud lnga ldan cod pan can //
translated: He has five locks of hair and a crown.

original: me tog rin chen phreng bas brgyan //
analyzed: me tog rin chen phreng bas brgyan //
translated: He is adorned with flower garlands and jewels.

original: phyag brgyad rim par bsnams pa ni //
analyzed: phyag brgyad rim par bsnams pa ni //
translated: He has eight hands, which hold the following:

original: ral gri mda' dang lcags kyu rdo rje g-yas //
analyzed: ral gri mda' dang lcags kyu rdo rje g-yas //
translated: In the right hands, a sword, arrow, goad, and vajra;

original: po ti gzhu dang zhags pa padma g-yon //
analyzed: po ti gzhu dang zhags pa padma g-yon //
translated: In the left hands, a book, bow, noose, and lotus.

original: gzhon nu mdzes pa'i rgyan dang ldan //
analyzed: gzhon nu mdzes pa'i rgyan dang ldan //
translated: He is a youthful, handsome prince.

original: kha dog lnga ldan 'od kyi dbus //
analyzed: kha dog lnga ldan 'od kyi dbus //
translated: In the center of five-colored light,

original: rdo rje skyil krung bzhugs pa la //
analyzed: rdo rje skyil krung bzhugs pa la //
translated: he sits in the vajra posture.

original: thugs kar shes rab 'khor lo'i dbus //
analyzed: thugs kar shes rab 'khor lo'i dbus //
translated: In his heart, in the center of the wisdom cakra,

original: nyi ma'i steng na ral gri aa yis mtshan //
analyzed: nyi ma'i steng na ral gri aa yis mtshan //
translated: on a sun is a sword marked with A.

original: 'khor lo'i rtsibs la gsang sngags dgod //
analyzed: 'khor lo'i rtsibs la gsang sngags dgod //
translated: Arrange the secret mantra on the spokes of the cakra.

original: yang na gnas bzhir 'khor lo bsam //
analyzed: yang na gnas bzhir 'khor lo bsam //
translated: Alternatively, imagine the cakra in the four places.

original: de ltar bsam gtan ting 'dzin dben //
analyzed: de ltar bsam gtan ting 'dzin dben //
translated: In this way, the meditative concentration of meditative stability is isolated.

original: de yang rgyud las /
analyzed: de yang rgyud las /
translated: Also, the tantra says:

original: dpal ldan sangs rgyas padma skyes //
analyzed: dpal ldan sangs rgyas padma skyes //
translated: Glorious Buddha, born from a lotus,

original: rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che //
analyzed: rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che //
translated: Vajra sun, great light.

original: rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od //
analyzed: rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od //
translated: The stainless moon vajra light,

original: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas aa las byung //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas aa las byung //
translated: The perfect Buddha arisen from A.

original: gzugs che lus kyang che ba ste //
analyzed: gzugs che lus kyang che ba ste //
translated: Great form, great body,

original: gdong ldan zur phud lnga dang ldan //🔽zur @144a * //
analyzed: gdong ldan zur phud lnga dang ldan // zur @144a * //
translated: With a face, possessing five locks of hair,

original: phud lnga pa me tog spos //
analyzed: phud lnga pa me tog spos //
translated: Five locks of hair, flowers, and incense,

original: lag pa brgya po kun bskyod cing //
analyzed: lag pa brgya po kun bskyod cing //
translated: Shaking all one hundred hands,

original: shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs //
analyzed: shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs //
translated: Holding a sword of wisdom, a bow and arrow,

original: rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che //
analyzed: rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che //
translated: A vajra hook, and a great noose,🔽Born from a vajra, the lord of vajras,🔽The glorious one, the lord of lotuses, the only youthful body in the three worlds,

original: rdo rje las skyes rdo rje'i bdag / dpal ldan padma gang gyi bdag /'jig rten gsum na gzhon lus gcig / kha dog sna tshogs bar ba'i 'od //
analyzed: rdo rje las skyes rdo rje'i bdag / dpal ldan padma gang gyi bdag /'jig rten gsum na gzhon lus gcig / kha dog sna tshogs bar ba'i 'od //
translated: With the light of various colors,

original: rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas //
analyzed: rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas //
translated: The perfect Buddha in vajra posture,

original: sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang //
analyzed: sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang //
translated: Holding various emanated wheels,

original: nyi ma 'char ka'i dkyil ltar mdzes //
analyzed: nyi ma 'char ka'i dkyil ltar mdzes //
translated: Beautiful like the center of the rising sun,

original: gsang sngags chen po rigs gsum pa //
analyzed: gsang sngags chen po rigs gsum pa //
translated: The great mantra, the one of three families,

original: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: sangs rgyas de yi thugs ka ru //
analyzed: sangs rgyas de yi thugs ka ru //
translated: In the heart of that Buddha,

original: aom las gyur pa'i rnam par snang mdzad ni /
analyzed: aom las gyur pa'i rnam par snang mdzad ni /
translated: Vairocana arisen from Om,

original: sku mdog dkar ba'i rang bzhin la //
analyzed: sku mdog dkar ba'i rang bzhin la //
translated: The nature of the white body

original: zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa //
analyzed: zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa //
translated: has one face and four arms.

original: dang po ral gri po ti'o //
analyzed: dang po ral gri po ti'o //
translated: The first two hold a sword and a book,

original: tha ma byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: tha ma byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: the last two are in the mudra of supreme enlightenment.

original: sangs rgyas de yi thugs ka ru //
analyzed: sangs rgyas de yi thugs ka ru //
translated: In the heart of that Buddha

original: ye shes sems dpa' mtshon gang pa //
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa' mtshon gang pa //
translated: is the knowledge being, the size of a thumb,

original: sku mdog dmar ser gser mdog la //
analyzed: sku mdog dmar ser gser mdog la //
translated: with a yellow-red body, the color of gold,

original: shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu bsnams //
analyzed: shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu bsnams //
translated: holding a sword of wisdom and a bow and arrow.

original: sangs rgyas de yi mdun nyid du //
analyzed: sangs rgyas de yi mdun nyid du //
translated: In front of that Buddha

original: padma'i gdan la sh'aka thub bsgom //
analyzed: padma'i gdan la sh'aka thub bsgom //
translated: one should visualize Shakyamuni on a lotus seat,

original: pho brang padma 'dab brgyad la //
analyzed: pho brang padma 'dab brgyad la //
translated: in the palace with eight lotus petals.

original: shar du h'um las gyur pa'i rdo rje mi bskyod pa //
analyzed: shar du h'um las gyur pa'i rdo rje mi bskyod pa //
translated: In the east, from HUM, is Vajra Akashagarbha,

original: sku mdog sngo skya'i rang bzhin la //
analyzed: sku mdog sngo skya'i rang bzhin la //
translated: with a blue-gray body,

original: dang po gnyis ni po ti ral gri bsnams //
analyzed: dang po gnyis ni po ti ral gri bsnams //
translated: holding a book and a sword with the first two hands,

original: tha ma gsang bas gnon la //
analyzed: tha ma gsang bas gnon la //
translated: pressing the secret place with the last two,

original: g-yon pa mnyam gzhag rdo rje bsnams //
analyzed: g-yon pa mnyam gzhag rdo rje bsnams //
translated: and holding a vajra in the gesture of equanimity with the left.

original: lho ru tr'am las rin chen 'byung ldan ni //
analyzed: lho ru tr'am las rin chen 'byung ldan ni //
translated: In the south, from TRAM, is Ratnasambhava,

original: ser po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa //🔽g-yas g-yon kun gyi dang po 'gro //
analyzed: ser po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa //🔽g-yas g-yon kun gyi dang po 'gro //
translated: yellow, with one face and four arms.🔽The first two on the right and left

original: tha ma mchog sbyin rin po che //
analyzed: tha ma mchog sbyin rin po che //
translated: At the end, Ratnasambhava, the supreme bestower of gifts.

original: nub tu hr'i: las snang ba mtha' yas ni //
analyzed: nub tu hr'i: las snang ba mtha' yas ni //
translated: In the west, from hrīḥ appears Amitābha,

original: dmar po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa //
analyzed: dmar po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa //
translated: red, with one face and four arms.

original: mnyam gzhag phyag rgya padma bsnams //
analyzed: mnyam gzhag phyag rgya padma bsnams //
translated: He holds a lotus in the gesture of meditative equipoise.

original: byang du h'a las gyur pa'i don yod grub pa ni //
analyzed: byang du h'a las gyur pa'i don yod grub pa ni //
translated: In the north, from hūṃ appears Amoghasiddhi,

original: ljang gu zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa //
analyzed: ljang gu zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa //
translated: green, with one face and four arms.

original: khu tshur phyag na rgya gram bsnams //
analyzed: khu tshur phyag na rgya gram bsnams //
translated: He holds a crossed vajra in his fists.

original: kun la rin chen sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa //
analyzed: kun la rin chen sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa //
translated: All are adorned with various jewels.

original: gnas gsum 'bru gsum byin gyis brlab //
analyzed: gnas gsum 'bru gsum byin gyis brlab //
translated: Consecrate the three places with the three seed syllables.

original: zhabs ni rdo rje skyil mo krung du bzhugs //
analyzed: zhabs ni rdo rje skyil mo krung du bzhugs //
translated: Their feet are in the vajra posture.

original: phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la //
analyzed: phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la //
translated: On the outer rim, on the eight spokes,

original: a'a li yongs su gyur pa las //
analyzed: a'a li yongs su gyur pa las //
translated: from the complete transformation of āḥ

original: nyi zla padma'i gdan stengs su //
analyzed: nyi zla padma'i gdan stengs su //
translated: are sun, moon, and lotus seats.

original: yab kyi thugs kar aa yi 'phro 'du las //🔽ai a'i au a'u /
analyzed: yab kyi thugs kar aa yi 'phro 'du las // ai a'i au a'u /
translated: In the father’s heart, from the transformation of aḥ🔽come i, ai, u, au,

original: ae aee ao aoo 'phros //
analyzed: ae aee ao aoo 'phros //
translated: e, ai, o, and au.

original: dbyangs yig 'od du zhu ba las //
analyzed: dbyangs yig 'od du zhu ba las //
translated: The vowels melt into light

original: chos 'khor rim bzhin bskor bar bya //
analyzed: chos 'khor rim bzhin bskor bar bya //
translated: and turn into the Dharma wheel, which is turned in stages.

original: kun du bzang po nam mkha'i @144b snying po dang // 'jam dpal sa yi snying po dang // sbyan ras gzigs dang sgrib pa sel //
analyzed: kun du bzang po nam mkha'i @144b snying po dang // 'jam dpal sa yi snying po dang // sbyan ras gzigs dang sgrib pa sel //
translated: Avalokiteśvara, and Nīvaraṇaviṣkambhin,

original: phyag na rdo rje byams pa'o //
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje byams pa'o //
translated: and Vajrapāṇi and Maitreya.

original: 'khor lo pi wang autpa la //
analyzed: 'khor lo pi wang autpa la //
translated: The wheel, the lute, the utpala,🔽the conch, the cup, the lotus, the jewel,

original: dung phor padma rin chen dang // myu gu rdo rje bum pa'o //
analyzed: dung phor padma rin chen dang // myu gu rdo rje bum pa'o //
translated: the sprout, the vajra, and the vase.

original: g-yon pa thams cad mchog sbyin no //
analyzed: g-yon pa thams cad mchog sbyin no //
translated: All the left hands are in the boon-granting gesture.

original: rin chen phreng ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan //
analyzed: rin chen phreng ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan //
translated: Adorned with the ornaments of the jewel garland,

analyzed: gdan la bzhugs shing 'gyings pa'i tshul // rgyud las / gsang sngags tshul chen las byung ba //
translated: seated on a seat, with a majestic manner.🔽The tantra says:🔽The bodhisattva mahāsattva

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
translated: arises from the great way of mantra,

original: rnam shes brgyad po rtog pa 'chang //
analyzed: rnam shes brgyad po rtog pa 'chang //
translated: bearing the eight consciousnesses and conceptual thoughts,

original: kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od //
analyzed: kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od //
translated: with various colors and blazing light.

original: dpal ldan blo dang sgeg par ldan //
analyzed: dpal ldan blo dang sgeg par ldan //
translated: Glorious, intelligent, and graceful,

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: thus it is taught.

original: phyogs kyi sgo bzhir bsgom pa ni //
analyzed: phyogs kyi sgo bzhir bsgom pa ni //
translated: The meditation on the four gates of the directions:

original: gtso bo'i thugs ka'i 'phro 'du las //
analyzed: gtso bo'i thugs ka'i 'phro 'du las //
translated: From the emanation and reabsorption at the heart of the principal,

original: dza: h'um bam ho: bzhi 'phros pas //
analyzed: dza: h'um bam ho: bzhi 'phros pas //

original: 'od zhu 'phros shing 'dus pa las //
analyzed: 'od zhu 'phros shing 'dus pa las //
translated: They melt into light and dissolve.

original: lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril //
analyzed: lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril //
translated: From that, hook, lasso, chain, and bell

original: sku mdog rang rang phyogs dang mthun //🔽rgyud las / rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che //
analyzed: sku mdog rang rang phyogs dang mthun // rgyud las / rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che //
translated: arise in the colors of their respective directions.🔽The tantra states:🔽The vajra hook and the great lasso,

original: 'dzin pa chen po rdo rje'i zhags //
analyzed: 'dzin pa chen po rdo rje'i zhags //
translated: the great holder, the vajra lasso,

original: 'jam dbyangs chen po sgra che ba //
analyzed: 'jam dbyangs chen po sgra che ba //
translated: the great Mañjughoṣa, the great sound.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is taught.

original: de nas thugs ka'i sa bon aa las 'od 'phros ye shes 'khor lo dgug gzhug bya //
analyzed: de nas thugs ka'i sa bon aa las 'od 'phros ye shes 'khor lo dgug gzhug bya //
translated: Then, light radiates from the seed syllable A at the heart, inviting the wisdom wheel to merge.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad sbyan drangs la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad sbyan drangs la /
translated: All buddhas are invoked.

original: aa a'a sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya b'a ka tsitta aa bhi shinytsa h'um tr'am hi tam aom //
analyzed: aa a'a sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya b'a ka tsitta aa bhi shinytsa h'um tr'am hi tam aom //

original: zhes dbang bskur bar bya //
analyzed: zhes dbang bskur bar bya //
translated: and confer the empowerment.🔽The tantra states:

original: rgyud las ; / sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med //
analyzed: rgyud las ; / sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med //

original: ye shes dbang bskur cod pan can //
analyzed: ye shes dbang bskur cod pan can //

original: zhes gsungs / de nas snying po bzlas par bya //
analyzed: zhes gsungs / de nas snying po bzlas par bya //

original: thugs ka'i shes rab 'khor lo la //
analyzed: thugs ka'i shes rab 'khor lo la //
translated: In the wisdom wheel at the heart,

original: de dbus lte ba'i 'khor lo la //
analyzed: de dbus lte ba'i 'khor lo la //
translated: in its center, in the navel cakra,

original: sngags phreng me tog dkyus pa ltar //
analyzed: sngags phreng me tog dkyus pa ltar //

original: de la dmigs te bzlas par bya /
analyzed: de la dmigs te bzlas par bya /
translated: Focusing on that, one should recite.

analyzed: aom w'a g'i shva ri mum / aom badzra t'ikshna du: kha tstshe da /

analyzed: pradzny'a dzny'a na m'urta ye /

analyzed: dzny'a na k'a ya w'a g'i shva ra aa ra pa tsa na ye te na ma: aa a'a sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya /

original: ha ra ha ra /
analyzed: ha ra ha ra /

original: aom h'um hr'i bha ga b'an /
analyzed: aom h'um hr'i bha ga b'an /

original: dzny'a na m'urti /
analyzed: dzny'a na m'urti /

original: w'a g'i shva ra /
analyzed: w'a g'i shva ra /

original: ma h'a p'a tsa /
analyzed: ma h'a p'a tsa /
translated: mahāpāca

original: sarba dharm'a ga ga na /
analyzed: sarba dharm'a ga ga na /

analyzed: aa ma la su pa ri shuddha dha rmma dh'a tu dzny'a na garbha aa /

analyzed: de yang rgyud las /

original: 'od bzang 'bar ba dpal gyi be'u //
analyzed: 'od bzang 'bar ba dpal gyi be'u //
translated: The auspicious knot of blazing excellent light,

original: 'od chen rnam par snang bar byed //
analyzed: 'od chen rnam par snang bar byed //
translated: the great light illuminating all,

original: gzi brjid phreng ba blta na sdug / gsang sngags chen po rigs gsum pa //
analyzed: gzi brjid phreng ba blta na sdug / gsang sngags chen po rigs gsum pa //
translated: the garland of splendor, beautiful to behold, the great mantra of the three families.

original: zhes gsungs pas so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pas so //
translated: Thus it is taught.

original: de nas mchod pa rgyas pa dbul //
analyzed: de nas mchod pa rgyas pa dbul //
translated: Then offer the extensive offerings.

original: aa a'a sarba th'a ga dh'u pa p'u dza mi gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
analyzed: aa a'a sarba th'a ga dh'u pa p'u dza mi gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /

original: bushpam / aa lo ke gandhe /
analyzed: bushpam / aa lo ke gandhe /
translated: Puṣpe aloke gandhe

original: @145a * // ni bi tye /
analyzed: @145a * // ni bi tye /
translated: naivedye🔽śabda.🔽In the tantra,

analyzed: shabta / rgyud las /
translated: it says:

original: mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che //
analyzed: mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che //

original: sems can thams cad dga' bar byed //
analyzed: sems can thams cad dga' bar byed //

analyzed: ces pa la sogs pa dug lda rang grol gyi mchod pa'o // aom badzra g'i ti h'um /

original: aom badzra nri tye h'um //
analyzed: aom badzra nri tye h'um //

original: aom badzra m'a le tr'am /
analyzed: aom badzra m'a le tr'am /

original: aom badzra l'a skye hri /
analyzed: aom badzra l'a skye hri /
translated: Oṃ vajra lāsyā hriḥ.🔽In the tantra,

analyzed: de yang rgyud las / mchod cing brjod par drang srong che //
translated: it says:

analyzed: zhes gsungs so // de nas mchod 'os bstod 'os phyag gi gnas //

original: zhes pas bstod de /
analyzed: zhes pas bstod de /

analyzed: 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das //

analyzed: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che //

analyzed: gdong lnga zur phung lnga dang ldan //

original: lag pa brgya pos kun bskyod cing //
analyzed: lag pa brgya pos kun bskyod cing //

analyzed: sbrul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang //

original: gom pa'i stobs kyis gar byed pa //
analyzed: gom pa'i stobs kyis gar byed pa //

analyzed: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba //

analyzed: 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog /'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' yi //

analyzed: ming ni yang dag brjod pa mchog /'jam dpal de la phyag 'tshal 'dud //

analyzed: gzhon nu'i sku lus 'chang ba po //

analyzed: 'jig rten gsum gyi mun sel ba //

original: 'jam dpal de la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
analyzed: 'jam dpal de la phyag 'tshal 'dud //

analyzed: nyid kyi 'dab bzang tshogs kyis ni //

analyzed: zla ba rgyas pa zil gnon cing //

original: rig pa rnam par gsal bsgyur la //
analyzed: rig pa rnam par gsal bsgyur la //

original: 'jam dpal de la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
analyzed: 'jam dpal de la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
translated: I bow down and pay homage to Mañjuśrī.

original: ma bgyis zur phud gsal ba la //
analyzed: ma bgyis zur phud gsal ba la //

analyzed: nor bu 'bar ba'i sku mnga' zhing //

original: nyid ni kun du dga' ba'i sku //
analyzed: nyid ni kun du dga' ba'i sku //

original: 'jam dpal de la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
analyzed: 'jam dpal de la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
translated: I bow down and pay homage to Mañjuśrī.

original: bdud rtsi 'dra zhing 'jam la zab //
analyzed: bdud rtsi 'dra zhing 'jam la zab //

original: 'jam dpal de la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
analyzed: 'jam dpal de la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
translated: Mañjuśrī, I pay homage and bow to you.

original: gangs kyi chu ltar gdangs gsal ba //
analyzed: gangs kyi chu ltar gdangs gsal ba //

analyzed: nyon mongs dri ma rab sngags pa //

analyzed: 'jam dpal de la phyag 'tshal 'dud // mche ba gtsigs dang bsgyings pa yi //
translated: Mañjuśrī, I pay homage and bow to you.🔽With a terrifying form, baring fangs and grimacing,

analyzed: 'jigs pa'i sku yi tshul gyis ni //

analyzed: ya ma'i dregs pa 'joms mdzad pa //

original: 'jam dpal de la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
analyzed: 'jam dpal de la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
translated: Mañjuśrī, I pay homage and bow to you.

original: rang gi spyan dang mdangs 'dra ba //
analyzed: rang gi spyan dang mdangs 'dra ba //

analyzed: autpal sngon pos rab mdzes pa //

original: rgya cher bstod pas rab bstod pa //
analyzed: rgya cher bstod pas rab bstod pa //
translated: Praising extensively the buddhas dwelling in the ten directions,

original: 'gro ba'i lam ni ston pa po //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i lam ni ston pa po //

original: 'jam dpal de la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
analyzed: 'jam dpal de la phyag 'tshal 'dud //

analyzed: de nas sems dpa' brgyad la bstod de // mkhas pa chen po thabs che ba //

analyzed: mkhas pa sgyu 'phrul chen po 'chang //

analyzed: kun du bzang po khyod la 'dud //

analyzed: shes rab chen po blo chen ldan //

analyzed: shes rab ye shes me po che //

analyzed: shes rab chen po skad cig la //

analyzed: 'jam dpal shes rab khyod la 'dud //

original: rdzu 'phrul chen po cher grags pa //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul chen po cher grags pa //

analyzed: sa yi snying po khyod la 'dud //

analyzed: sbyan ras gzigs dbang khyod la 'dud //

original: shugs chen mgyogs pa chen po ste //
analyzed: shugs chen mgyogs pa chen po ste //

analyzed: stobs po che la thabs che ba //

analyzed: smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho ste //

analyzed: phyag na rdo rje khyod la 'dud //

analyzed: 'dzin pa chen po rdo rje zhags //

analyzed: 'jam dbyangs chen po sgra che ba //

original: ye shes sgom khyod la 'dud //
analyzed: ye shes sgom khyod la 'dud //

analyzed: rdo rje dang po kun du bzang //

analyzed: phyag 'tshal phyag na rdo rje la'o //

analyzed: rdo rje rgyal po sangs rgyas mchog / rdo rje lcags kyu de bzhin gshegs //

original: nges pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas mchog / phyag 'tshal rdo rje 'gugs khyod la'o //
analyzed: nges pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas mchog / phyag 'tshal rdo rje 'gugs khyod la'o //
translated: Homage to you, Vajra Summoner.

original: rdo rje chags pa bde ba che //
analyzed: rdo rje chags pa bde ba che //
translated: Vajra Passion, great bliss,

original: rdo rje mda' ni dbang byed pa //
analyzed: rdo rje mda' ni dbang byed pa //
translated: Vajra Arrow, controlling,

original: bdud kyi 'dod pa rdo rje che //
analyzed: bdud kyi 'dod pa rdo rje che //

original: phyag 'tshal rdo rje gzhu khyod la'o //🔽rdo rje legs pa bde ba che //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal rdo rje gzhu khyod la'o // rdo rje legs pa bde ba che //
translated: Homage to you, Vajra Bow.🔽Vajra Good, great bliss,

original: rdo rje mgu ba dga' ba che //
analyzed: rdo rje mgu ba dga' ba che //
translated: Vajra Joy, great delight,

original: rab dgyes rgyal po buddha mchog /
analyzed: rab dgyes rgyal po buddha mchog /
translated: King of Joy, supreme buddha,

analyzed: @146a * // phyag 'tshal rdo rje dgyes pa la //
translated: Homage to you, Vajra Joy.

original: rdo rje rin chen rdo rje'i don //
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen rdo rje'i don //
translated: Vajra Jewel, vajra meaning,

original: rdo rje nam mkha' nor bu che //
analyzed: rdo rje nam mkha' nor bu che //
translated: Vajra Space, great jewel,

original: nam mkha'i snying po rdo rje phyug / phyag 'tshal rdo rje rin chen la'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i snying po rdo rje phyug / phyag 'tshal rdo rje rin chen la'o //
translated: Homage to you, Vajra Wealth, Akashagarbha,

original: rdo rje gzi brjid cher 'bar ba //
analyzed: rdo rje gzi brjid cher 'bar ba //
translated: Vajra Splendor blazing with great splendor,

original: rdo rje nyi ma rgyal ba'i 'od //
analyzed: rdo rje nyi ma rgyal ba'i 'od //
translated: Vajra Sun, Victorious Light,

original: rdo rje gzi brjid gzi brjid che //
analyzed: rdo rje gzi brjid gzi brjid che //
translated: Vajra Splendor, great splendor,

original: phyag 'tshal rdo rje 'od khyod la'o //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal rdo rje 'od khyod la'o //
translated: homage to you, Vajra Light.

original: rdo rje don rab rdo rje dpal //
analyzed: rdo rje don rab rdo rje dpal //
translated: Vajra Meaning, excellent Vajra,

original: rdo rje rgyal mtshan rab dga' byed //
analyzed: rdo rje rgyal mtshan rab dga' byed //
translated: Vajra Banner, bringing great joy,🔽great Vajra, Jewel Crest,

original: rdo rje chen po rin chen tog / phyag 'tshal rdo rje dpal khyod la'o //🔽rdo rje bzhad mo bzhad pa che //
analyzed: rdo rje chen po rin chen tog / phyag 'tshal rdo rje dpal khyod la'o // rdo rje bzhad mo bzhad pa che //
translated: homage to you, Vajra Glory.🔽Vajra Laughter, great laughter,

original: rdo rje 'dzum pa ngo mtshar che //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzum pa ngo mtshar che //
translated: Vajra Smile, great wonder,

original: dga' zhing rab dga' rdo rje ston //
analyzed: dga' zhing rab dga' rdo rje ston //
translated: joy, great joy, Vajra teaching,

original: phyag 'tshal rdo rje dga' ba la'o //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal rdo rje dga' ba la'o //
translated: homage to you, Vajra Joy.

original: rdo rje chos rab de bzhin don//
analyzed: rdo rje chos rab de bzhin don//
translated: Vajra Dharma, suchness, meaning,

original: rdo rje padma rab dga' byed //
analyzed: rdo rje padma rab dga' byed //
translated: Vajra Lotus, bringing great joy,

original: rdo rje dbang rab rdo rje'i spyan //
analyzed: rdo rje dbang rab rdo rje'i spyan //
translated: Vajra Empowerment, Vajra Eye,

original: phyag 'tshal rdo rje spyan khyod la'o //🔽rdo rje rno ba theg pa che //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal rdo rje spyan khyod la'o // rdo rje rno ba theg pa che //
translated: homage to you, Vajra Eye.🔽Vajra Sharpness, great vehicle,

original: rdo rje ral gri mtshon chen po //
analyzed: rdo rje ral gri mtshon chen po //
translated: Vajra Sword, great weapon,

original: 'jam dpal rdo rje rab tu zab //
analyzed: 'jam dpal rdo rje rab tu zab //
translated: Manjushri Vajra, very profound,

original: phyag 'tshal rdo rje blo gros la'o //🔽rdo rje rgyu dang snying po che //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal rdo rje blo gros la'o // rdo rje rgyu dang snying po che //
translated: Homage to Vajramathi!🔽Vajra cause, great essence,

original: rdo rje 'khor lo tshul chen po //
analyzed: rdo rje 'khor lo tshul chen po //
translated: Vajra wheel, great way,

original: rab bskor rdo rje las byung ba //
analyzed: rab bskor rdo rje las byung ba //
translated: Well-turned, arisen from vajra,

original: phyag 'tshal rdo rje snying khyod la'o //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal rdo rje snying khyod la'o //
translated: Homage to Vajracitta!🔽Vajra speech, supreme self-awareness,

original: rdo rje gsung ba rang rig mchog / rdo rje bzlas pa rab 'grub phyir //
analyzed: rdo rje gsung ba rang rig mchog / rdo rje bzlas pa rab 'grub phyir //
translated: For the sake of accomplishing vajra recitation,

original: mi gsung rdo rje mchog bsgrub pa //
analyzed: mi gsung rdo rje mchog bsgrub pa //
translated: Unspoken, accomplishing the supreme vajra,

original: phyag 'tshal rdo rje gsung khyod la'o //🔽rdo rje las rab rdo rje bka' //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal rdo rje gsung khyod la'o // rdo rje las rab rdo rje bka' //
translated: Homage to Vajra Speech!🔽Vajra activity, vajra command,

original: las kyi rdo rje kun rab 'gro //
analyzed: las kyi rdo rje kun rab 'gro //
translated: Vajra activity, going everywhere,

original: rdo rje nges pa rgya che ba //
analyzed: rdo rje nges pa rgya che ba //
translated: Vajra certainty, vast,

original: phyag 'tshal rdo rje rgya gram la'o //🔽rdo rje sku ni brtan pa che //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal rdo rje rgya gram la'o // rdo rje sku ni brtan pa che //
translated: Homage to Vajra Cross-legged!🔽Vajra body, very firm,

original: rdo rje go cha sra ba ste //
analyzed: rdo rje go cha sra ba ste //
translated: Vajra armor, solid,

original: brtson 'grus mchog ste dka' thub che //
analyzed: brtson 'grus mchog ste dka' thub che //
translated: Supreme diligence, great austerity,

original: phyag 'tshal rdo rje brtson 'grus la'o //🔽rdo rje gnod sbyin thabs chen po //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal rdo rje brtson 'grus la'o // rdo rje gnod sbyin thabs chen po //
translated: Homage to Vajra Effort!🔽Vajra yaksha, great means,

original: rdo rje mche ba gtsigs pa che //
analyzed: rdo rje mche ba gtsigs pa che //
translated: Vajra fangs, very fierce,

original: bdud 'joms rdo rje mi zad pa //🔽phyag 'tshal rdo rje drag po la //
analyzed: bdud 'joms rdo rje mi zad pa // phyag 'tshal rdo rje drag po la //
translated: Vajra of the Conqueror of Demons, inexhaustible,🔽Homage to Vajra Wrathful One,

original: rdo rje mtshams sbyor rab tu 'dud //
analyzed: rdo rje mtshams sbyor rab tu 'dud //
translated: Vajra Conjunction, I bow down.

original: rdo rje bcings pa rab grol cing //
analyzed: rdo rje bcings pa rab grol cing //
translated: Vajra Bond, completely liberated,

original: phyag 'tshal rdo rje gnyis med la'o //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal rdo rje gnyis med la'o //

original: lhag chad yi ge brgya pas bshags /
analyzed: lhag chad yi ge brgya pas bshags /
translated: Excess and omissions are confessed with the hundred-syllable mantra.

original: aa ti gatstsha mu:yis gshegs //
analyzed: aa ti gatstsha mu:yis gshegs //
translated: With ati gaccha muh, they depart.

original: bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis //
analyzed: bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis //
translated: By this root of virtue of mine,🔽May I lead all beings without exception.

original: 'gro ba ma lus 'den par shog /'jam dpal gyi sgrub thabs zhi ba 'od kyi rim pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so /
analyzed: 'gro ba ma lus 'den par shog /'jam dpal gyi sgrub thabs zhi ba 'od kyi rim pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so /
translated: The Sādhana of Mañjuśrī called the Stages of Śubhraprabha is complete.

original: // / sdom pa bzang po'i thugs dam /
analyzed: // / sdom pa bzang po'i thugs dam /
translated: The Resolve of the Excellent Being

analyzed: lo ts'a ba dar ma bzhis bsgyur ba'o//
